column2:
Do you run UI5 freestyle apps in production?
("freestyle" here mostly means "core" UI5 usage.
With some -but no strict!- adherence to Fiori UI-/UX-guidelines.
A question with regard to "Standard Fiori apps" comes later in the sequence)
column3: Do you run Fiori Elements apps in production?
column4:
Do you run Standard (Fiori) apps in production?
("Fiori" here applies to pre-delivered SAP apps)
column5: What technologies and variants do you use in your productive UI5 freestyle app?
column6: What variations of and how many productive Standard apps are you running? [delivered by SAP "as-is", but with Customizing]
column7: Are you running automated tests for your productive UI5-, FE- and/or Fiori-app?
column8: How do you bootstrap new UI5-Freestyle- and Fiori-apps?
column9: How do you bootstrap new Fiori Elements apps?
column10: What IDEs are you using for developing UI5-based apps (incl Freestyle, Fiori Elements, and Standard)?
column11: How do you deploy your productive apps? [from BAS]
column12: How do you deploy your productive apps? [via BTP's "Cloud Transport Management"]
column13: How do you deploy your productive apps? [via GitHub Actions]
column14: How do you deploy your productive apps? [via GitLab Pipelines]
column15: How do you deploy your productive apps? [via BitBucket Pipelines]
column16: How do you deploy your productive apps? [from Jenkins]
column17: How do you deploy your productive apps? [from the developer's computer]
column18: How many UI5 freestyle apps are you running in production?
column19: How many Fiori Elements apps are you running in production?
column20: How many Standard (Fiori) apps are you running in production?
column21: Which open source packages do you use for your UI5 development that were developed specifically for UI5 and are not maintained by SAP?
column22: Which UI5 version are most of your productive apps currently using?
column23: Which deployment model do you primarily use for productive UI5-based apps?
column24: What is the relationship between the use of SAP GUI and UI5-based Apps (Freestyle, FE, standard Fiori) in production at your org/company/enterprise/area of responsibility?
column25: What variations of and how many Fiori Element apps are you running in production? [self developed/generated]
column26: What variations of and how many Fiori Element apps are you running in production? [self developed/generated  including "Breakouts", aka "Modifications"; officially referred to as "App Extensions", https://ui5.sap.com/#/topic/340cdb2ba97c4843979f905a70a327ee)]
column27: What variations of and how many Fiori Element apps are you running in production? [delivered by SAP "as-is", without code modifications, but eventually with Customizing]
column28: What variations of and how many Fiori Element apps are you running in production? [delivered by SAP, but modified/extended ("Adaptation Extensions", https://ui5.sap.com/#/topic/52fc48b479314d0688be24f699778c47)]
column29: What variations of and how many productive Standard apps are you running? [delivered by SAP, but modified with Code]
column30: What variations of and how many productive Standard apps are you running? [both: delivered by SAP, but modified with Code and customized]
column31: What variations of and how many productive Standard apps are you running? [delivered by SAP "as-is", 1:1 in Production]
